thumb.name: Better Every Day Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHi. Robin!%3Cbr%3EJust peeking in to say...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHope you're getting better%3Cbr%3Ewith each and every day!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EGet Well Soon

thumb.name: Special Care
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhile You%26#146;re Getting%3Cbr%3Ethe Special Care%3Cbr%3EYou Need. Dennis%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EKeeping you close%3Cbr%3Ein thought.%3Cbr%3Eand wishing you%3Cbr%3Epeaceful days%3Cbr%3Eof healing rest.%3Cbr%3E
